FOOD FOR THOUGHT: Comparing 2018 to 1987. Generally, market crashes (1-day, multi-week) occur after parabolic price moves: 1987, 1929, late 90's $NASDAQ. Not close to the current price structure. If 2018 was 1987, $SPX would have risen 31% to peak at 3,716, 27% above peak.
